title: $850+ Asia Airfare Sale from Singapore Airlines
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $850+ Asia Airfare Sale from Singapore Airlines $850+ Asia Airfare Sale from Singapore Airlines September 15, 2015 5:46pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Singapore Airlines' newest international sale features travel to several Asian cities, including Denpasar, Manila, Seoul, and Tokyo; plus to Frankfurt, Germany. Fares start at $350 each way (shown as $700 round-trip below) and include all taxes and fees. Travel (and restrictions) varies by route from now through the last day of the year. Round-trip travel is required. 
Singapore Airline's latest sale features travel to several Asian destinations, including Cambodia, Indonesia, Singapore, and Vie ... more 
Singapore Airlines' newest international sale features travel to several Asian cities, including Denpasar, Manila, Seoul, and Tokyo; plus to Frankfurt, Germany. Fares start at $350 each way (shown as $700 round-trip below) and include all taxes and fees. Travel (and restrictions) varies by route from now through the last day of the year. Round-trip travel is required. 
Singapore Airline's latest sale features travel to several Asian destinations, including Cambodia, Indonesia, Singapore, and Vietnam, among others. Fares start at $850 round-trip and include all taxes and fees. The sale's best feature is its extended travel window—as far off as May 31, 2016! Tickets, however, must be booked by September 27, 2015. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of this sale by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros: Far-fung, exotic destinations. Lengthy travel window. Cons:
